pageTitle: Date you were first affected by coronavirus
default-text: This might be when you or your child started self-isolating.
coronavirus-high-risk-shielding-text: This might be when you received a letter or text message from the NHS.

coronavirusDate.label: What date were you first affected by coronavirus?

errors.required: Enter the date you were first affected by coronavirus
errors.missingDay: Date you were first affected by coronavirus must include a day
errors.missingMonth: Date you were first affected by coronavirus must include a month
errors.missingYear: Date you were first affected by coronavirus must include a year
errors.missingDayAndMonth: Date you were first affected by coronavirus must include a day and a month
errors.missingDayAndYear: Date you were first affected by coronavirus must include a day and a year
errors.missingMonthAndYear: Date you were first affected by coronavirus must include a month and a year
errors.badFormatYear: Enter the date you were first affected by coronavirus with a year in the right format, for example 2001 not 01
errors.notReal: Enter a real date for when you were first affected by coronavirus
errors.notRealDigits: Enter a real date for when you were first affected by coronavirus, using only digits
errors.outOfRange: Date you were first affected by coronavirus must be in the past
